system.description:
Jammin’ on the sick instrument the Noise Thrasher is able to signal Death itself to come aid the Warparty. Each enemy in a 40ft radius of the Noise Thrasher must make a [[/save resolve]] or suffer -5 to their AC until the end of the next turn.

DON'T FEAR THE REAPER: The Noise Thrasher can expend 2 additional Shred Points to keep playin’ causing the Riff to last an additional turn.
